snippet: An Episcopal rector says he has come under fire before, but never so much as when he told the Muslim Public Affairs Council it could hold its annual convention at his church.
abstract: Rev J Edwin Bacon Jr, rector of All Saints Episcopal Church in Pasadena, Calif, denounces accusations from conservative Christian group Institute on Religion and Democracy that his church is harboring Muslim extremists.
lead_paragraph: An Episcopal rector says he has come under fire before, but never so much as when he told the Muslim Public Affairs Council it could hold its annual convention at his church.

headline.seo: Pasadena Church Criticized for Hosting Muslim Convention
headline.main: Church Opens Arms to Muslim Group, and Is Taken to Task
headline.print_headline: Church Opens Arms to Muslim Group, and Is Taken to Task
